Patients must follow required baseline laboratory data : Platelet count ≥ 50,000/mm3 ( may maintain transfusion ) Hemoglobin ≥ 7.5 g/dL ( may maintain transfusion growth factor ) Absolute neutrophil count ≥ 1,000/mm3 ( may maintain growth factor ) ALT/AST ≤ 2.0 time ULN Total bilirubin ≤ 2.0 time ULN ( unless relate hemolysis ) Creatinine < 2.0 time ULN 6 .
